		 has_country_flag = impossible

		hard_attack = 0.1
		sea_attack = 0.15

		soft_attack = 2.125
		hard_attack = 1.075
		sea_attack = 1.45

#### Airlaunched torpedoes
air_launched_torpedoes_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}
	### CAG ###
	david_mccampbell = {
		sea_attack = 0.8
	}
	gregory_boyington = {
		sea_attack = 0.8
	}

	research_bonus_from = {
		submarine_engineering = 0.20
		naval_engineering = 0.15
		aeronautic_engineering = 0.10
	}

	difficulty = 1

	# common for all techs.
	change = no
	stealable = no
	start_year = 1918
	first_offset = 1919
	additional_offset = 1	# one new every 2 years
	max_level = 10
}

basic_single_engine_airframe_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

	toshio_ota = {

	start_year = 1918
}

#### bombing sights
bombing_sight_hidden = {  # 1930: Vector,  1939: area-sight (Mk. XIV), 1940 ABS Automated Bomb Sight, 1943 SABS Stabilized Automated Bomb Sight

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

	david_mccampbell = {
		hard_attack = 1
		sea_attack = 1.75
		surface_defence = 0.5
	}
	gregory_boyington = {
		hard_attack = 1
		sea_attack = 1.75
		surface_defence = 0.5
	}

	change = no
	stealable = no
	difficulty = 1

	# common for all techs.
	start_year = 1918
	first_offset = 1919
	additional_offset = 1	# one new every 2 years
	max_level = 6
}

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

	toshio_ota = {
		surface_defence = 0.05
		air_attack = 0.5
		air_defence = 0.5
		surface_detection = 0.5
		air_detection = 0.5
		#build_cost_ic = 0.5
	}
	tetsuzo_iwamoto = {
		surface_defence = 0.05
		air_attack = 0.5
		air_defence = 0.5

		air_detection = 0.5

pilot_rescue_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

	toshio_ota = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	tetsuzo_iwamoto = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	takeo_okumura = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	hiro_shinohara = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	hiro_nishizawa = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	teresio_martinoli = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	luigi_gorrini = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	leonardo_ferrulli = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	franco_lucchini = {
		default_morale = 0.1
	}
	franco_bordoni = {
		default_morale = 0.1

	# common for all techs.
	start_year = 1918
}
